title: 9FC8AE2F-53AE-47BB-9111-17837B83F2D7
important_topics: The importance of mining an organization's unique data to develop tailored fraud strategies.
The value of scrappy data analysis and offline strategies in fraud detection.
Real-time digital signals and continuous monitoring for fraud prevention.
The need for a robust fraud ecosystem with collaboration between different teams.
Proactive root cause analysis and fraud deconstruction to understand missed fraud and improve strategies.
fraud_tips: Mine your own data to identify risky patterns.
Leverage resources from various teams within your organization (e.g., marketing, AML, cyber, customer service).
Implement a continuous monitoring program to identify abnormal activities.
Focus on real-time digital signals for fraud prevention.
Conduct thorough root cause analysis to understand missed fraud and close gaps.
tactics: Exploiting vulnerabilities in authentication tools, especially in-person.
Exploiting gaps in digital channels by shifting to call centers and in-person channels.
Taking advantage of temporary or less experienced staff on the front line.
Testing controls and quickly exploiting any weaknesses.
